ttp_template:
<group name="default_gateway_dpdk_hostname_ip_address">
system settings hostname {{HOSTNAME | ORPHRASE}}
system settings dpdk {{DPDK | ORPHRASE}}
system settings mgmt ip address {{IP_ADDRESS | re("\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+\\.\\d+")}} {{NETMASK | ORPHRASE}}
system settings default-gw {{DEFAULT_GATEWAY | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
system settings hostname gandalf
system settings dpdk enable
system settings mgmt ip address 11.22.33.43 255.255.255.240
system settings default-gw 11.22.33.41
textfsm_template:
Value HOSTNAME ([\w-]+)
Value DPDK (enable|disable)
Value IP_ADDRESS ([A-F0-9\.\:]+)
Value NETMASK ([A-F0-9\.\:]+)
Value DEFAULT_GATEWAY ([A-F0-9\.\:]+)


Start
  ^system\ssettings\shostname\s+${HOSTNAME}
  ^system\ssettings\sdpdk\s${DPDK}
  ^system\s+settings\s+mgmt\s+ip\s+address\s+${IP_ADDRESS}\s+${NETMASK}
  ^system\s+settings\s+default-gw\s+${DEFAULT_GATEWAY} -> Record

EOF
